Tunable.name: BOREDOM_QUEUE_SIZE
Tunable.description: The number of different interactions that are memorized to calculate boredom. The larger the number, the easier it will be for Sims to be bored even if different affordance are used. e.g. If this number is 1, then boredom will apply to the last run interaction only. If the Sim runs X X X Y X, then X's boredom count is 1. e.g. If this number is 3, then boredom will apply to the last three run interactions. If the Sim runs X X Y Z Z X, the X's boredom count is 3, Y's i 1, and Z's is 2.

Tunable.name: CENTER_PLACEMENT_JIG_OBJECT_DEF
Tunable.description: Temporary object (jig) to be placed when computing position of a sim joining a social group.

Tunable.name: FACING_AWAY_PENALTY
Tunable.description: The number of meters to penalize destinations that involve facing away from the social group. This will be applied to destinations that violate the tuning for FACING_RANGE_IDEAL.

Tunable.name: FACING_RANGE_IDEAL
Tunable.description: The facing angle restriction on the ideal constraint for this group. A constraint with this facing restriction will be added to a constraint set where the constraint without this restriction gets the facing away penalty.

Tunable.name: FOCUS_LISTENER_SCORE
Tunable.description: Focus score assigned to the listeners in a social group. Higher numbers make Sims more likely to look at listeners.

Tunable.name: FOCUS_SPEAKER_SCORE
Tunable.description: Focus score assigned to the speaker in a social group. Higher numbers make Sims more likely to look at the speaker.

Tunable.name: INCOMPATIBLE_OBJECT_REPOSITION_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The distance to use when searching for a new social group focus position if the initial positition is invalidated by an incompatible object.

Tunable.name: MAXIMUM_NUMBER_OF_NON_ADJUSTABLE_SIMS
Tunable.display: Maximum Number Of Non Adjustable Sims
Tunable.description: The maximum number of entries in the list of non-adjustable Sims. Sims are placed in the list when they complete mobile posture transitions, and can be in the list more than once, thus occupying multiple spots.

Tunable.name: MINIMUM_JIG_MOVE_EPSILON
Tunable.description: A Sim will not adjust their position if the distance is smaller than this

Tunable.name: MINIMUM_JIG_TURN_EPSILON
Tunable.description: A Sim will not adjust their position if the turning distance (arc in radians) is smaller than this

Tunable.name: MOVE_CONSTRAINT_EPSILON_SQ
Tunable.description: When the focal point of the group moves by more than this epsilon, attempt to re-center the social constraint.

Tunable.name: MOVEMENT_COST_BASE
Tunable.description: Cost for moving at all when incrementally adjusting the position of a Sim

Tunable.name: MOVEMENT_COST_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: Multiplier on the cost of moving a given distance when adjusting the position of a Sim

TunableTuple.name: SETTLED_SOCIAL_ADJUSTMENT_DELAY
TunableTuple.description: Once a group has become stagnant, the amount of time in seconds to delay before performing a social adjustment attempt.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: Minimum amount of time, in seconds, to delay adjustment (when stagnant).

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: Maximum amount of time, in seconds, to delay adjustment (when stagnant)

Tunable.name: SOCIAL_ADJUSTMENT_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: The affordance to push when doing social adjustment.

TunableTuple.name: SOCIAL_ADJUSTMENT_DELAY
TunableTuple.description: Amount of time, in seconds, to delay before the next social adjustment attempt.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: Minimum amount of time, in seconds, to delay adjustment.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: Maximum amount of time, in seconds, to delay adjustment

Tunable.name: SOCIAL_GROUP_ARRANGEMENT_SETTLING_TIME
Tunable.description: After the social geometry changes, we keep track of the time. Once SOCIAL_GROUP_ARRANGEMENT_SETTLING_TIME has elapsed, we attempt social adjustment less frequently (using SETTLED_SOCIAL_ADJUSTMENT_DELAY).

Tunable.name: SOCIAL_GROUP_STAGNATION_TIME
Tunable.description: After a social adjustment occurs we keep track of the time. We will not clear out the list of Sims that cannot move in the group until SOCIAL_GROUP_STAGNATION_TIME Sim minutes have elapsed.

Tunable.name: WORST_PLACED_SIM_RANDOMNESS
Tunable.description: A floating point value that determines the randomness of the selection of the worst placed Sim. The worst placed Sim is given a chance to change position by social adjustment. Larger values are more random. A value of 0 means that there is no randomness, while a value of 1000 means the selection is almost completely random.
